mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM member_consignee_address WHERE 1=1 AND user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND disabled=0
AND source = 1
ORDER BY update_time DESC

SELECT DISTINCT sudo.id,sudo.consignee_name,sudo.area,sudo.address,sudo.mobile,sudo.room_id,sudo.community_id,sudo.source,sudo.longitude,sudo.latitude,sudo.distance,sudo.area_ext,sudo.area_name,sudo.city_name,sudo.province_name, CASE WHEN distance <= se.service_scope*1000 THEN '0' WHEN sudo.longitude = 0 AND sudo.latitude = 0 THEN '0' ELSE '1' END as beyondType from( SELECT m.id,m.consignee_name,m.area,m.address,m.mobile,m.room_id,m.community_id,m.source,m.longitude,m.latitude,m.area_ext,m.area_name,m.city_name,m.province_name, ROUND( 6378.138 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW( SIN((s.latitude * PI() / 180- m.latitude * PI() / 180) / 2), 2 ) + COS(s.latitude * PI() / 180) * COS(m.latitude * PI() / 180) * POW( SIN((s.longitude * PI() / 180 - m.longitude * PI() / 180) / 2), 2 ) ) ) * 1000 ) AS distance, s.id as storeId FROM member_consignee_address m,store_info s where m.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and s.id = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.disabled =0 AND m.source = 1 ) sudo LEFT JOIN store_info_ext AS se ON sudo.storeId = se.store_id where se.store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY sudo.distance ASC
SELECT * FROM member_consignee_address WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND is_default = 1 AND disabled = 0
mapper.sql:
SELECT IFNULL(addr.id,'') AS addressId, IFNULL(addr.province_name,'') AS provinceName, IFNULL(addr.city_name,'') AS cityName, IFNULL(addr.area_name,'') AS areaName, IFNULL(addr.area_ext,'') AS areaExt, IFNULL(addr.use_time,'') AS useTime, cast(addr.`source` as SIGNED) AS isCommunity, IFNULL(addr.address,'') AS address, IFNULL(addr.consignee_name,'') AS consigneeName, IFNULL(addr.mobile,'') AS mobile, IFNULL(addr.longitude,'') AS longitude, IFNULL(addr.latitude,'') AS latitude, ( SELECT
IF (count(1) > 0, 0, 1) FROM store_info store LEFT JOIN store_server_area area ON (area.store_id = store.id) WHERE (store.area_type = 0 OR (
area.type = 0 AND ( (area.area_type = 2 AND area.province_id = addr.province_id ) OR (area.area_type = 1 AND area.city_id = addr.city_id ) OR (area.area_type = 0 AND area.city_id = addr.city_id AND (area.area_id = addr.area_id or addr.area_id is null or addr.area_id = '')) ) ) OR ( area.type = 1 AND SQRT( ( ((addr.longitude-area.longitude)*PI()*12656*cos(((addr.latitude+area.latitude)/2)*PI()/180)/180) * ((addr.longitude-area.longitude)*PI()*12656*cos (((addr.latitude+area.latitude)/2)*PI()/180)/180) ) + ( ((addr.latitude-area.latitude)*PI()*12656/180) * ((addr.latitude-area.latitude)*PI()*12656/180) ) ) < area.distance )
) AND store.id = #{storeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS isOutRange FROM member_consignee_address addr WHERE addr.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and addr.disabled = 0
AND addr.source = 1
mapper.select:
select * from(
) a where a.isOutRange = 0 order by useTime desc limit 1

SELECT t.id addressId, t.consignee_name AS consigneeName, t.mobile, t.province_name AS provinceName, t.city_name AS cityName, t.area_name AS areaName, t.area_ext AS areaExt, t.address, t.longitude, t.latitude, cast(t.source as SIGNED) AS isCommunity, IF(t1.id is null,1,0) AS isOutRange FROM member_consignee_address t LEFT JOIN activity_seckill_range t1 ON t.province_id = t1.province_id AND t.city_id = t1.city_id AND t1.activity_seckill_id = #{activitySeckillId} WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.disabled=0 ORDER BY t.update_time DESC

SELECT t.id addressId, t.consignee_name AS consigneeName, t.mobile, t.province_name AS provinceName, t.city_name AS cityName, t.area_name AS areaName, t.area_ext AS areaExt, t.address, t.longitude, t.latitude, cast(t.source as SIGNED) AS isCommunity, 0 AS isOutRange FROM member_consignee_address t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.disabled=0 ORDER BY t.update_time DESC
